title: Abortion providers; prohibit public business with.
subject: Public Health and Welfare

actions.description: Referred To Public Health and Welfare

extras.summary: AN ACT TO PROHIBIT PUBLIC ENTITIES FROM CONDUCTING BUSINESSES WITH ABORTION PROVIDERS, ABORTION ASSISTANCE ENTITIES AND AFFILIATES THERETO; TO DEFINE RELEVANT TERMS; TO BAN PUBLIC ENTITIES FROM PROVIDING LOGISTICAL SUPPORT TO ABORTION PROVIDERS, ABORTION ASSISTANCE ENTITIES AND AFFILIATES TO ASSIST WITH PROCURING AN ABORTION; TO OUTLINE PROHIBITED AND EXEMPTED TRANSACTIONS OF PUBLIC ENTITIES WITH ABORTION PROVIDERS, ABORTION ASSISTANCE ENTITIES AND AFFILIATES; TO PROVIDE PROCEDURE FOR INSTANCES WHERE A TAXPAYER RESOURCE TRANSACTION RESULTS IN A TRANSFER OF PUBLIC FUNDS TO AN INELIGIBLE RECIPIENT; TO PROVIDE CIVIL PENALTIES FOR PUBLIC ENTITIES FOUND IN VIOLATION OF THIS ACT; TO REQUIRE THE STATE BOARD OF MEDICAL LICENSURE TO PROMULGATE RULES NECESSARY TO COMPLY WITH THIS ACT; TO ESTABLISH DAMAGES AMOUNTS FOR INDIVIDUALS AND/OR ENTITIES FOUND GUILTY OF VIOLATING THIS ACT; TO PROHIBIT INSURANCE COVERAGE FOR ELECTIVE ABORTIONS; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
